/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. Dominating the center of the image is a large concrete overpass, its curved structure arching gracefully over the street below. The overpass's gray color contrasts with the vibrant blue of the sky, which is lightly speckled with clouds. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the distance. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
